code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"../styling/DropDown.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DropDown=_ref=>{let{options,title,callback}=_ref;const[selectedOption,setSelectedOption]=useState(null);const[show,setShow]=useState(false);const onSelect=data=>{callback(data);};const handleOptionSelect=option=>{setSelectedOption(option);onSelect(option);setShow(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dd",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dd-header",onClick:()=>setShow(!show),children:[title,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"dd-arrow ".concat(show?'up':'down')})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"o_menu",children:show&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"o",children:options.map(option=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"so",onClick:()=>handleOptionSelect(option),children:option},option))})})]});};export default DropDown;
